title: Start
body:
Welcome in our bookcase
What are you doing here?
[[We're trying to escape from here|1]]
[[we are looking for those who would like to join us|2]]

So run you fools
but you will not get to anywhere
If you try through the kitchen window, the toster will stop you
If you want to go out the door, you need a key
[[Tell me something about the Toster|11]]
[[Where can we find the key|12]]

In the living room you will surely find a flip-flop
She loves meeting new people
Hair Dryer may also be interested
He always complains about boredom

The Toster is very nice kitchenware, but he's very stubborn
and "but" it is the worst word you can use when talking to him
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>

The key is hidden underneath the automobile's familiar
Search for it yourself! Be gone!
<<close DialoguePopup 1>>
